hh3cPex.name: hh3cPex

revisions.description: Initial version of this MIB module.

hh3cPex.contactinfo: Platform Team H3C Technologies Co., Ltd. Haidian District Beijing P.R. China Http://www.h3c.com Zip:100085
hh3cPex.description: This MIB is used to manage Port Extender (PEX) information. This MIB is applicable to products that support PEX.

hh3cPexPortMinId.name: hh3cPexPortMinId
hh3cPexPortMinId.description: Lowest PEX port ID that can be used to uniquely identify a PEX port.

hh3cPexPortMaxId.name: hh3cPexPortMaxId
hh3cPexPortMaxId.description: Highest PEX port ID that can be used to uniquely identify a PEX port.

hh3cPexMinAssociateId.name: hh3cPexMinAssociateId
hh3cPexMinAssociateId.description: Lowest ID that can be assigned to a port extender (PEX).

hh3cPexMaxAssociateId.name: hh3cPexMaxAssociateId
hh3cPexMaxAssociateId.description: Highest ID that can be assigned to a PEX.

hh3cPexMaxPortPerPexPort.name: hh3cPexMaxPortPerPexPort
hh3cPexMaxPortPerPexPort.description: Maximum number of ports that can be bound to a PEX port.

hh3cPexPortTable.name: hh3cPexPortTable
hh3cPexPortTable.description: This table contains objects used to configure the PEX ports.

hh3cPexPortId.name: hh3cPexPortId
hh3cPexPortId.description: ID that can be used to uniquely identify a PEX port. The value range is hh3cPexPortMinId to hh3cPexPortMaxId.

hh3cPexPortAssociateId.name: hh3cPexPortAssociateId
hh3cPexPortAssociateId.description: ID assigned to a PEX. The value range is hh3cPexMinAssociateId to hh3cPexMaxAssociateId. The value is 0xffff if the PEX is not assigned an ID. For a successful configuration, the ID should not be used by any other PEX.

hh3cPexPortEntPhysicalIndex.name: hh3cPexPortEntPhysicalIndex
hh3cPexPortEntPhysicalIndex.description: Entity index of a PEX in the IRF. A value of zero indicates that the PEX is not online.

hh3cPexPortDescr.name: hh3cPexPortDescr
hh3cPexPortDescr.description: Description for the PEX port. The default value is 'pex-port XXXX', where 'XXXX' is hh3cPexPortId. Writing a zero-length string to this object resets the value to the default.

hh3cPexPortStatus.name: hh3cPexPortStatus
hh3cPexPortStatus.description: Status of the PEX. offline: The PEX is absent or its configuration is incomplete. loading: The PEX is loading software. online: The PEX is operating correctly.

hh3cPexPortRowStatus.name: hh3cPexPortRowStatus
hh3cPexPortRowStatus.description: The control that allows creation and deletion of entries. Values include createAndGo, active, and destroy. If the row to be created or modified already exists, an error message is returned. If the row to be deleted does not exist, a success message is returned.

hh3cPexPhyPortTable.name: hh3cPexPhyPortTable
hh3cPexPhyPortTable.description: This table contains objects used to manage physical ports that can be bound or are already bound to a PEX port.

hh3cPexPhyPortEntry.name: hh3cPexPhyPortEntry
hh3cPexPhyPortEntry.description: Information about a physical port that can be bound to or has been bound to a PEX port.

hh3cPexPhyPortStatus.name: hh3cPexPhyPortStatus
hh3cPexPhyPortStatus.description: Status of the physical port that is bound to a PEX port. The following are status values: unknown: The physical port is not bound to any PEX port. down: The physical port is link down. blocked: The physical port is blocked and cannot forward traffic. forwarding: The physical port can forwarding traffic.

hh3cPexPhyPortBelongToPexPort.name: hh3cPexPhyPortBelongToPexPort
hh3cPexPhyPortBelongToPexPort.description: ID of the PEX port to which the physical port belongs. The value range is hh3cPexPortMinId to hh3cPexPortMaxId. A value of zero indicates that the port doesn't belong to any PEX port.

hh3cPexPhyPortNeighborEntIndex.name: hh3cPexPhyPortNeighborEntIndex
hh3cPexPhyPortNeighborEntIndex.description: Entity index of a physical port that connects the PEX to the parent device. This value is identical to entPhysicalIndex in ENTITY-MIB. A value of zero indicates that the physical port is not bound to any PEX port or is not up.

hh3cPexPortOnline.name: hh3cPexPortOnline
hh3cPexPortOnline.description: An hh3cPexPortOnline trap is sent when the PEX transitions to online state.

hh3cPexPortOffline.name: hh3cPexPortOffline
hh3cPexPortOffline.description: An hh3cPexPortOnline trap is sent when the PEX transitions to offline state.

hh3cPexPhyPortForwarding.name: hh3cPexPhyPortForwarding
hh3cPexPhyPortForwarding.description: An hh3cPexPhyPortForwarding trap is sent when the PEX physical port transitions to forwarding state.

hh3cPexPhyPortBlocked.name: hh3cPexPhyPortBlocked
hh3cPexPhyPortBlocked.description: An hh3cPexPhyPortBlocked trap is sent when the PEX physical port transitions from forwarding state to blocked state.

hh3cPexEntPhysicalIndexBind.name: hh3cPexEntPhysicalIndexBind
hh3cPexEntPhysicalIndexBind.description: This index is identical to entPhysicalIndex in ENTITY-MIB.
